comments._comment0: This is the current default configuration for the server.
comments._comment1: You can change the ip and port as long as they are valid, if they are malformed in any way, the program will close (crash) with no warning or errors.
comments._comment2: If you have a custom 404 page, great! set the relative file path, for example: errorPages/my404.html, if left blank or file doesn't exist, the server will use a predefined 404 page
